c|inst|I|opc|rn|rd|opc
# addi R3
11|000000|1|000|0000|0011|011100000000
# addi R4
11|000000|1|000|0000|0100|000000000000
# addi R2
11|000000|1|000|0000|0010|000000000000
# CMP R2
11|000000|1|110|0010|1011|000000001010
# j 12
00|101|0|00000000000000000000001000 
# lw R5
11|010000000|0|0010|0101|001111101000
# CMP R5,R3
11|000000|0|110|0101|1011|000000000011
# j 10
01|101|0|00000000000000000000000011
# addi R3
11|000000|1|000|0101|0011|000000000000
# addi R4
11|000000|1|000|0010|0100|000000000000
# addi R2
11|000000|1|000|0010|0010|000000000001
# j 3
11|101|0|11111111111111111111111000 
# sw R3
11|010000000|1|0000|0011|011111010000
# sw R4
11|010000000|1|0000|0100|011111010100
